attributes.action: Do not reduce foreign aid from 0.7% of GDP
attributes.additional_details: The UK’s soft power has already been weakened by Brexit and the merger of our foreign ministries. We cannot and should not step away from our commitment to international development, as outlined in the International Development (Official Development Assistance Target) Act 2015, at a time when the global community needs it most. Especially as we drastically increase military spending.
attributes.background: The UK government should not reduce its commitment to foreign aid or alter the International Development (Official Development Assistance Target) Act 2015

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561068

This petition was briefly opened incorrectly, but has been closed because there is an existing petition making the same request.
